messages.subject: TV and White spots in throat
messages.msgSnippet: ... Yes, this is true! And I m guilty of doing this to strangers as well. ... Could be thrush, not just babies get it. It is very painful and looks like white
messages.messageBody:
> From: Nanci Kuykendall <aisliin@...>
> You know it also occurred to me that a book is a
> conversation started too. How many of you have been
> approached by strangers who have read the book you are
> readin, or want to read it, or like the author? I
> know I have.


Yes, this is true! And I'm guilty of doing this to strangers as well.


> By the way, for everyone who was concerned about my
> health. A little investigation determined that I have
> some kind of infection in my throat (white spots) but
> not in the proper pattern to be strep.


Could be thrush, not just babies get it. It is very painful and looks like
white spots. Acidophilus does wonders...

Blue Skies!
-Robin-
Mom to Mackenzie (8/28/96) and Asa (10/5/99) who spent much energy today
drawing "wounds" on their bodies with red markers in graphic detail
http://www.geocities.com/the_clevengers Flying Clevenger Family
